segments.text: Do you have coffee shops in China , too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . There are many tea houses and bars in China , too . People can drink , eat and relax at these places .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You like to go to these places , don â€™ t you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sometimes the music there is so beautiful . It is very romantic . I can stay there for hours .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you often go there alone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I often go there with my friends .
segments.speaker: S2
